posts.post_content: I just LOVE this card. Its cheap, common, got a nice pic, and is a "must to got 4" in every Naya deck. Very often i start with a hand with 2 Forest, 2 [Wild Nacatl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Nacatl), 1 [Lush Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lush Growth) and 2 other cards. 2 3/3 creatures on turn 2..... Even if you drow it at late game, still its a good cheap and relyable creature.

posts.post_content: A 3/3 for 1 mana. This shatters the curve in every way imaginable. Do not underestimate the power and speed of this card. This has been one of the best additions to Zoo decks ever. Absolutely insane one drop. Easily worth a 5/5 for being a staple in any RWG (Naya colored) deck.
